description: This file defines a Quiz Page component for a LightningJS-based quiz application, handling quiz question display, option selection, navigation, and scoring logic.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component class representing the quiz page, managing UI layout, quiz state, and user interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the current question and resets option backgrounds and selection.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Handles selection of an answer option, updating background highlights.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next question or navigates to the results page, updating score accordingly.

calls: r.navigate('/results', { state: { score: this.$state.score, total: quiz.length } })
